solution: Login again, check Keycloak configuration, verify token expiration
Check user roles in Keycloak, verify @PreAuthorize annotations

cause: Resource doesn't exist or wrong URL
solution: Verify endpoint path, check if resource exists in database
Check application logs, verify database connection, check entity relationships

cause: Migration checksum mismatch or syntax error
solution: Run fix-liquibase-checksums.sql, verify migration XML syntax

cause: PostgreSQL not running or wrong credentials
solution: Start PostgreSQL service, verify application.yml database settings

cause: Frontend URL not in Keycloak client valid redirect URIs
solution: Add frontend URL to Keycloak client configuration
Reduce file size or increase limit in application.yml
Run npm run build to see errors, fix type definitions
Run mvn clean install, check pom.xml dependencies
